problemStatements.title: Secure Authentication System
problemStatements.description: Design and implement a multi-factor authentication system with biometric verification, OTP, and secure session management for a banking application.

problemStatements.title: AI-Powered Code Review Assistant
problemStatements.description: Develop an intelligent code review tool that uses machine learning to detect bugs, security vulnerabilities, and suggest improvements in real-time.

problemStatements.title: Blockchain Supply Chain Tracker
problemStatements.description: Create a transparent supply chain management system using blockchain technology to track products from manufacturer to consumer.
